resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

workspaceId.name: workspaceId
workspaceId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workspaceId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: consider-duration-format
options.description: Whether to return the time entry's duration rounded to minutes or seconds based on duration format (hh:mm or hh:mm:ss) from workspace settings

options.name: hydrated
options.description: Whether to return the time entry's project, task and tags in full and not just their IDs

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

updateFields.name: updateFields

values.name: customFieldId
values.description: The ID of the field to add custom field to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

values.name: value
values.description: The value to set on custom field

options.name: projectId
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: tagIds
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

updateFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
projectId.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

filters.name: filters

options.name: name
options.description: Text to match in the task name

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'workspace' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'workspace' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'workspace' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'workspace' THEN HIDE parameter 'workspaceId'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'clientId'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'clientId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'client' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'clientId'
IF resource == 'client' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'client' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'project' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'project' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tag' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'tag' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'tagId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'tag' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'projectId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'task' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'taskId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'task' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'user' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'start'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'timeEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'timeEntryId'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'timeEntryId'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'timeEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'timeEntry' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'timeEntryId'
IF operation == 'update' AND resource == 'timeEntry' THEN SHOW parameter 'updateFields'
